channel.title: SkypeForBusiness on diecknet
channel.description: Recent content in SkypeForBusiness on diecknet

item.title: Moving from Skype for Business to Teams sucks
item.description: The upgrade process from Skype for Business Online to Microsoft Teams is a disaster. I had several SMB clients reporting unnecessary errors regarding Teams/Skype. With unnecessary I mean: They had no issues using Teams until 2021-07-31. Issue: Suddenly Skype Meetings are back in Outlook mobile One client reported, that they suddenly have Skype Meetings in Outlook on iOS again, instead of Teams Meetings. That particular client manages their Microsoft 365 tenant themselves.
